creator: kamil.kurop@ser-solutions.pl
text:
After selecting "Save Test Plan as" (property string: save_all_as, a window pops up with surprising suggested name, under which we can save test plan:

  expected value: name of the test plan
  received value: name of the currently selected item.

Cordially,
Kamil

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: It does not make sense for Save Test Plan As to use the existing name of the plan, as that is what the Save option does.
